Summary: green orb streaked across the western sky faster than ANYTHING I EVER SAW B4
divs: sighting detailssunday evening monday morning 25th 26th march 2012,at approz 12.45 am ,i was driving back from perth western australia,about 2\3 rds the way to bunbury south west w.a and to my right i saw a huge green orb streak across the sky and disappear into the distant horizon,has anybody see the same thing,ive never seen anything like that before,id love to know what it was thanks
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in clifton park
There were no other sightings in clifton park on or around March 24th 2012
